amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Secretary to use existing authority to mitigate severe shoaling at Hampton Harbor, New Hampshire.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Shea-Porter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
